nodes.text: Jood Kabbas was a renowned Duros sculptor whose works were available in the galaxy by 980 BBY. By this time, Dark Jedi Set Harth had acquired several of Kabbas' sculptures, which he displayed in his mansion on the planet Nal Hutta.
Jood Kabbas was mentioned in Darth Bane: Dynasty of Evil, a 2009 novel by Drew Karpyshyn. Kabbas' gender was not established in the novel.
